descriptionlist.description: Double tap on any home screens to activate iSnake mode then swipe to control your snake. Enjoy (^_^)
Please follow me on Twitter (@ReverseThatApp) and drop me a message for any feedback or issues so that I can improve iSnake in the next versions :)

screenshot.description: Double tap on any home screens to activate iSnake mode then swipe to control your snake. Enjoy (^_^)

changelog.change: Make iSnake to eat your home screen icons on any pages :P
